languages.text: "И у меня есть вопросы для него. Я хочу знать, почему меня оставили в неведении касательно всего, что происходило в тенях Простора. Почему на пути сюда погибли все аколиты... почти все аколиты Лорд-инквизитора. Почему..." {n}Хейнрикс резко выдыхает и встряхивается.{/n} "Я хочу выслушать его. А затем — вынести свое суждение".

"And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrix exhales sharply and stiffens.{/n} "I want to hear what he has to say. And then make my judgement."
languages.original_text: "И у меня есть вопросы для него. Я хочу знать, почему меня оставили в неведении касательно всего, что происходило в тенях Простора. Почему на пути сюда погибли все аколиты... почти все аколиты Лорд-инквизитора. Почему..." {n}Хейнрикс резко выдыхает и встряхивается.{/n} "Я хочу выслушать его. А затем — вынести свое суждение".

traits.locale_text: "And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrichs exhales sharply and stiffens up.{/n} "I want to her him out. And then make my judgement."

"And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrichs exhales sharply and stiffens up.{/n} "I want to her him out. And then make my judgement."

"And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrix exhales sharply and stiffens.{/n} "I want to hear what he has to say. And then make my judgement."

"And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrix exhales sharply and stiffens.{/n} "I want to hear what he has to say. And then make my judgement."

"And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrix exhales sharply and stiffens.{/n} "I want to hear what he has to say. And then make my judgement."

languages.text: “而且我有问题要问他。我想知道，为什么科罗努斯扩区的阴影中发生了这么多事情，而我却始终被蒙在鼓里？为什么大审判官所有的侍仆都死在了来这里的路上？嗯，确切地说，是几乎所有的侍仆。为什么……”{n}海因里希猛地呼了口气，绷紧了身体。{/n}“我想听听他要说些什么，之后再做判断。”
languages.original_text: "And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrix exhales sharply and stiffens.{/n} "I want to hear what he has to say. And then make my judgement."

traits.locale_text: “而且我有问题要问他。我想知道，为什么科罗努斯扩区的阴影中发生了这么多事情，而我却始终被蒙在鼓里？为什么审判长所有的侍仆都死在了来这里的路上？嗯，确切地说，是几乎所有的侍仆。为什么……”{n}海因里希猛地呼了口气，绷紧了身体。{/n}“我想听听他要说些什么，之后再做判断。”

languages.text: «Y tengo preguntas para él. Quiero saber por qué no me informó de nada de lo que ocurría en las sombras de la Extensión. Por qué todos los acólitos murieron durante el viaje... bueno, casi todos los acólitos del Lord Inquisidor. Por qué...». {n}Heinrix deja escapar un suspiro efímero antes de recuperar la firmeza.{/n} «Quiero ver lo que tiene que decir, y después lo juzgaré».
languages.original_text: "And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrix exhales sharply and stiffens.{/n} "I want to hear what he has to say. And then make my judgement."

traits.locale_text: «Y tengo preguntas para él. Quiero saber por qué no me informó de nada de lo que ocurría en las sombras de la Extensión. Por qué todos los acólitos murieron durante el viaje... bueno, casi todos los acólitos del Lord Inquisidor. Por qué...». {n}Heinrix deja escapar un suspiro efímero antes de recuperar la firmeza.{/n} «Quiero ver lo que tiene que decir, y después lo juzgaré».

languages.text: 「それから、彼には聞きたいことがあります。エクスパンスの影で起きていたすべてのことについて、我には何も知らされないままだったのはなぜか。すべてのアコライトがここで死んだのはなぜか…つまり、ロード・インクィジターのアコライトの大半が死んだ。なぜ…」{n}ハインリックスは大きく息を吐き、硬直する。{/n}「彼の言い分を聞きたいのです。それから判断しようではありませんか」
languages.original_text: "And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrix exhales sharply and stiffens.{/n} "I want to hear what he has to say. And then make my judgement."

traits.locale_text: 「それから、彼には聞きたいことがあります。エクスパンスの影で起きていたすべてのことについて、我には何も知らされないままだったのはなぜか。すべてのアコライトがここで死んだのはなぜか…つまり、ロード・インクィジターのアコライトの大半が死んだ。なぜ…」{n}ハインリックスは大きく息を吐き、硬直する。{/n}「彼の言い分を聞きたいのです。それから判断しようではありませんか」

languages.text: "Und ich habe Fragen an ihn. Ich will wissen, warum ich über die Geschehnisse in den Schatten der Ausdehnung im Dunkeln gelassen wurde. Warum all die Akolythen auf dem Weg hierher gestorben sind ... Nun, fast alle Akolythen des Großinquisitors. Ich ..." {n}Heinrix atmet scharf aus und richtet sich auf.{/n} "Ich will hören, was er zu sagen hat. Und dann mein Urteil fällen."
languages.original_text: "And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrix exhales sharply and stiffens.{/n} "I want to hear what he has to say. And then make my judgement."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich habe Fragen an ihn. Ich will wissen, warum ich über die Geschehnisse in den Schatten der Ausdehnung im Dunkeln gelassen wurde. Warum all die Akolythen auf dem Weg hierher gestorben sind ... Nun, fast alle Akolythen des Großinquisitors. Ich ..." {n}Heinrix atmet scharf aus und richtet sich auf.{/n} "Ich will hören, was er zu sagen hat. Und dann mein Urteil fällen."

languages.text: « Et j'ai des questions à lui poser. Je veux savoir pourquoi on m'a caché tout ce qui se tramait dans les ombres des Étendues. Pourquoi tous les acolytes sont morts en chemin... Enfin, presque tous les acolytes du seigneur inquisiteur, du moins. Pourquoi... » {n}Heinrix pousse un bref soupir et se raidit.{/n} « Je tiens à entendre ce qu'il a à dire, après quoi je porterai mon jugement. »
languages.original_text: "And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrix exhales sharply and stiffens.{/n} "I want to hear what he has to say. And then make my judgement."

traits.locale_text: « Et j'ai des questions à lui poser. Je veux savoir pourquoi on m'a caché tout ce qui se tramait dans les ombres des Étendues. Pourquoi tous les acolytes sont morts en chemin... Enfin, presque tous les acolytes du seigneur inquisiteur, du moins. Pourquoi... » {n}Heinrix pousse un bref soupir et se raidit.{/n} « Je tiens à entendre ce qu'il a à dire, après quoi je porterai mon jugement. »

languages.text: "Ona soracağım sorular var. Enginlik'in gölgelerinde olan bitenler hakkında neden bilgilendirilmediğimi öğrenmek istiyorum. Neden havarilerin hepsinin... Yani Lord Engizisyoncu'nun havarilerinin neredeyse hepsinin buraya gelirken öldüğünü. Neden..." {n}Heinrix, keskin bir şekilde iç çekip vücudunu dikleştiriyor.{/n} "Söyleyeceklerini duymak istiyorum. Hükmümü sonrasında vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "And I have questions for him. I want to know why I was left in the dark about everything that was happening in the shadows of the Expanse. Why all the acolytes died on the way here... Well, almost all of the Lord Inquisitor's acolytes. Why..." {n}Heinrix exhales sharply and stiffens.{/n} "I want to hear what he has to say. And then make my judgement."
